name: Director James Kessler
role: Head of NAU Space Intelligence Agency - Government antagonist/complex ally
core_wound: Failed to prevent a terrorist attack in 2029 that killed 3,000 people because he dismissed a junior analyst's warning as improbable. Now trusts institutions over individuals.
wants: To control the Voyager situation for national security - prevent chaos and maintain order
needs: To learn that control isn't the same as safety - to trust people outside the system
voice_markers: Military-precise diction - short sentences, active voice
Uses euphemisms for harsh realities ('managed disclosure', 'containment protocols')
Rarely uses first person - speaks in institutional 'we'
Asks rhetorical questions to make points ('Do you know what panic looks like?')
Calm, measured tone even when delivering threats
contradiction: Genuinely believes he's protecting humanity but willing to sacrifice individual freedoms. Patriot who might betray global interests.
physical_description: Silver-haired, ramrod posture, expensive tailored suits. Expressionless face - trained to reveal nothing. Strong handshake that feels like a test.

relationships.Marcus Reid: Sees him as both threat and asset - wants to control or neutralize him
relationships.Sofia Navarro: Views as radical element - potential security risk
